Government
==========

[**Boards & Commissions**](https://cityofslaton.com/boards-and-commissions/)  
View meeting information, members, minutes, and agendas for the Slaton board and commissions.

[**City Council**](https://cityofslaton.com/city-council-members/)  
View the members of the City Council.

[**City Secretary**](https://cityofslaton.com/city-secretary/)  
Find information on the City Commission, elections, the Texas Ethics Commission, and the Code of Ordinances.

[**Municipal Court**](https://cityofslaton.com/municipal-court/)  
Learn about the Municipal Court’s jurisdiction, find information regarding your citation, and see the options you have for handling your citation.
